specialRules.hint: The hero and all friendly units within 12”t get the Furious special rule.
specialRules.name: Bloodthirsty
specialRules.label: Bloodthirsty
specialRules.description: The hero and all friendly units within 12”t get the Furious special rule.

specialRules.hint: If this model is killed in melee then the attacking unit takes 3 automatic hits.
specialRules.name: Boom!
specialRules.label: Boom!
specialRules.description: If this model is killed in melee then the attacking unit takes 3 automatic hits.

specialRules.hint: Whenever the hero fights an enemy in melee, place an infection marker next to the target. Enemies with infection markers count as having Quality -1 for the rest of the game, and if they are within 3” of friendly units at the beginning of a round those units also become infected.
specialRules.name: Infection
specialRules.label: Infection
specialRules.description: Whenever the hero fights an enemy in melee, place an infection marker next to the target. Enemies with infection markers count as having Quality -1 for the rest of the game, and if they are within 3” of friendly units at the beginning of a round those units also become infected.

specialRules.hint: When the hero is activated pick one of the following orders, and the hero and all friendly models within 12” get one of these special rules until the end of the round: • Plague Burst: +3” when moving.
specialRules.name: Plague Command
specialRules.label: Plague Command
specialRules.description: When the hero is activated pick one of the following orders, and the hero and all friendly models within 12” get one of these special rules until the end of the round: • Plague Burst: +3” when moving.

specialRules.hint: Enemy units fighting the hero in melee gets -1 to their morale test rolls.
specialRules.name: Terrifying
specialRules.label: Terrifying
specialRules.description: Enemy units fighting the hero in melee gets -1 to their morale test rolls.

specialRules.hint: Whenever this unit takes a morale test it is passed automatically. Then roll as many dice as remaining models/tough in the unit, and for each result of 1-2 the unit takes one wound, which can’t be regenerated.
specialRules.name: Undead
specialRules.label: Undead
specialRules.description: Whenever this unit takes a morale test it is passed automatically. Then roll as many dice as remaining models/tough in the unit, and for each result of 1-2 the unit takes one wound, which can’t be regenerated.

spells.name: Infestation
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets Poison in melee next time it fights.

spells.name: Bio-Horror
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 1 automatic hit with AP(2) and Deadly(3).

spells.name: Vigour
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets Regeneration next time it takes wounds.

spells.name: Panic Virus
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 24” must take a morale test. If failed it takes 3 automatic hits with AP(2).

spells.name: Onslaught
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” may immediately move by up to 6”.

spells.name: Plague
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 6” takes 1 automatic hit per model.
